title: Ep 23: Samantha Irby
itunes:title: Ep 23: Samantha Irby
itunes:subtitle: Samantha Irby is here! The funniest person on earth, Samantha Irby! Author of the first #GeeThanksBookClub read, Wow, No Thank You, is here to talk about all things butts, lotion, and what she’s watching on tv.Follow along with recs (and share your ...
description:
Samantha Irby is here! The funniest person on earth, Samantha Irby! Author of the first #GeeThanksBookClub read, Wow, No Thank You, is here to talk about all things butts, lotion, and what she’s watching on tv.


Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod


Want a good laugh? Order Wow, No Thank You! Order it from your local indie or my favorite one: Amherst Books (https://www.amherstbooks.com/). (Tell Shannon I sent you!) 


Mentioned On This Episode!

  • Up&Up Toner: https://www.target.com/p/deep-cleaning-pore-treatment-8-fl-oz-up-38-up-8482/-/A-15742228
  • Wow, No Thank You!: https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/576724/wow-no-thank-you-by-samantha-irby/
  • Tushy Travel Bidet: https://fave.co/3f3OaAF 
  • Nintendo Switch: https://amzn.to/2KZvQep
  • Animal Crossing: https://amzn.to/2xjbeu6
  • Twist It Up Comb: https://amzn.to/2VO81MK 


PS. If you aren’t listening to Doree and Kate’s new podcast, HERE FOR YOU, it’s a great way to both acknowledge the state of the world while also not overwhelming yourself (as I tend to do). Listen here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/here-for-you/id1503438711


Thanks for listening!

Site Makeover Alert! Check out blog posts and all of the recommended products by past guests, listeners and Caroline at www.geethanksjustboughtit.com 

Shop the Amazon store! https://www.amazon.com/shop/geethanksjustboughtit

Join the book club! We’re reading Wow, No Thank You by Samantha Irby: https://www.instagram.com/p/B-kvVHqnKiH/

The Spreadsheet is UNDER CONSTRUCTION and it will be back soon, better than ever!

Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod


We have a phone number! Call it! You may be featured on an upcoming special listeners-only ep of the podcast: 424-245-0736.

Want to get in touch more formally? Have a rec you want to rec? Shoot me an email! Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com












Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
